20101204140640.000|20101204140645.000|TR0|

20101204140700.000|20101204140705.000|TR0|

20101204140740.000|20101204140745.000|TR0|carried out immediately.

20101204142205.000|20101204142210.000|TR0|Thursday it overwhelmed the
20101204142210.000|20101204142215.000|TR0|country's firefighting force and
20101204142215.000|20101204142220.000|TR0|prompted an unprecedented call

20101204142235.000|20101204142240.000|TR0|Saturday suggested negligence

20101204142345.000|20101204142350.000|TR0|would address the US and the UN
